summary: This document is a calendar entry for a 15-minute conference call regarding Jeffrey Epstein, scheduled for September 27, 2007. The organizer was Alex Acosta, who was the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida at the time. The entry was created and later modified in 2015, indicating it was part of a later review or disclosure.

keyFacts: A key meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for September 27, 2007, organized by then-U.S. Attorney Alex Acosta.
The document is a calendar entry that was created in 2015 and modified in July 2015, suggesting it was part of a records review or FOIA release years after the original event.
The brief, 15-minute duration and the label 'X-PERSONAL' for the conference call may indicate it was a high-level or sensitive discussion.
